channel.title: Master Command Bugged?
channel.description: ok I setup my max level to 999, so when I try to use the master command it takes me to level 137, then when I do it again, my stats max out to 999, and my overall level is now 81, how can I get my over all level to be 999 as well?

item.title: Master Command Bugged?
item.dc:creator: @fatcat2248 fatcat2248
item.description:
@fatcat2248 wrote:

max lvl 999 !!!
i didnt even no moparscape could go that highâ€¦

} if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { stillgfx(333, absY, absX); addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(0, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("wow that was fast leveling"); }

if u want to change the lvling wer it ses
addSkillXP(486000000, 24); just change those (the 1 on the left is the ammont of exp it will give the 1 on the right is the stat)
